title: Red tracker help
body:
Is there anyway to read through the red tracker posts by board? Each time i want to check if some rioter posted any gameplay content i have to sift through a ton of Help & Support threads. Granted those Support threads gave quite a lot of knowledge but if there was some way to just sort by board or something it might help. 

Thanks

replies.body: There's no way to sort through different redposts by board, unfortunately. Feel free to leave feedback on the [Boards Feedback](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback) sub if you'd like.
